DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether modules of Metacognitive Training: Jumping to Conclusions and To empathize... are effective in the treatment of patients with schizophrenia. Also it was investigated whether these modules have specific impact on cognitive biases severity.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Metacognitive Training Single Modules: Jumping to Conclusions and To Empathize...
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators employ randomized controlled trial design. Patients in ward were recruited for the study in three waves. In each wave patients were assessed pre-intervention, then randomly allocated in one of three groups: with modules of Metacognitive Training or control group. Then patients were assessed post-intervention.
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of psychotic disorders informed consent neurological disorders
